law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 454, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 80, sec. 5, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 10, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 19, effective March 30, 1992. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 156, sec. 4. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 9, effective June 16, 1960.
